title: Ep 43 | Preaching with a Gun, Handling Disagreements in the Church, and Recognizing God's Spirit
description:
Phil, Al, and Jase talk about the recent Texas church shooting, Jase explains disagreements on theology, Phil gives a lesson on recognizing God’s spirit and evil spirits, and we begin our study of the Book of John..
